result.description: JSON objects describing reusable channel parameters.

$ref.description: A simple object to allow referencing other components in the specification, internally and externally. Constraints: format: uri-reference.

anyOf.description: Describes a parameter included in a channel name.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

description.description: A brief description of the parameter. This could contain examples of use. GitHub Flavored Markdown is allowed.

location.description: A runtime expression that specifies the location of the parameter value

schema.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().
